title: ** Unauthorized Access to Protected Page
preconditions: User does not provide valid credentials for authentication
main_flow: System displays a dialog box requesting username and password for authentication.
User clicks the Cancel button instead of entering credentials.
4. System responds with an error message "Not authorized" and displays the text on the page.
postconditions: User remains on the same page.
The error message "Not authorized" remains visible on the page.
User cannot access the protected content on the page.
If user enters valid credentials, they will be granted access to the protected page.
If user enters incorrect credentials multiple times, the system may lock the account temporarily or permanently.
If the connection is lost during authentication, the user will be prompted to re-enter their credentials.
This use case follows the standard format and covers the given requirement while maintaining clarity and testability.
